metadata.title: CVE-2018-12467 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Authorized users of the openbuildservice before 2.9.4 could delete packagesby using a malicious request against projects having theOBS:InitializeDevelPackage attribute, a similar issue to CVE-2018-7689.

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
